content.question: Which of the following best explains a connection between policies intended to address the Great Depression and earlier Progressive Era reform policies?

choices.label: Both provided direct monetary relief to people living in poverty.
Both sought to use moral reform to address economic issues.
Both sought to create a stronger financial regulatory system.
Both relied on strong alliances with organized labor unions.

content.answer: Both sought to create a stronger financial regulatory system.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
